text: Class | Asymptomatic Mild tachypnea or diaphoresis with feeding in infants Class Il Dyspnea on exertion in older children Marked tachypnea or diaphoresis with feeding in infants. Prolonged feeding times with Class Il growth failure Marked dyspnea on exertion in older children Class IV Symptoms such as tachypnea, retractions, grunting, or diaphoresis at rest
